p: Furthermore, the 10% extract ointment treated mice displayed rapid healing as evidenced by a faster epithelialization period ( p< 0.001), in comparison to the negative control group. The average period of epithelialization was 17.5, 16.3, and 14.3 days for the 5% (w/w), standard drug and 10% (w/w) extract ointments, respectively. However, negative control groups failed to re-epithelize during the course of treatment ( Table 5).
